data.fullContent: Forty-six universities are beefing up behavioral health care on campus in an effort to provide support services and limit the stigma of mental health treatment. The colleges and universities announced Tuesday that they have committed to improving students' access to mental health services. Joining the effort are schools including Cornell University; the University of California, Berkeley; and Vanderbilt University. In addition, Howard University says it will provide therapy to students and faculty. According to the coalition, all of the schools will make online counseling available 24/7, hire more campus mental health staff, provide training for students on how to seek treatment, and educate the campus community about mental health issues.

q1.translation: 46所大学正在校园内加强行为卫生保健，以提供支持服务，限制心理健康治疗的污名化。这些学院和大学周二宣布，他们已承诺改善学生获得心理健康服务的机会。
q1.front: Forty-six universities are beefing up behavioral health care on campus in an effort to provide support services and limit the stigma of mental health treatment. The colleges and universities announced Tuesday that they have committed to improving students' access to mental health services.
q1.content: Forty-six universities are beefing up behavioral health care on ____ in an effort to provide support services and limit the stigma of mental health treatment. The colleges and ____ announced Tuesday that they have ____ to improving students' access to mental ____ services.

q2.translation: 46所大学正在校园内加强行为卫生保健，以提供支持服务，限制心理健康治疗的污名化。这些学院和大学周二宣布，他们已承诺改善学生获得心理健康服务的机会。康奈尔大学(Cornell University)、加州大学伯克利分校;范德比尔特大学。此外，霍华德大学表示，它将为学生和教师提供治疗。据该联盟称，所有的学校都将提供24/7的在线咨询服务，雇佣更多的校园心理健康人员，为学生提供如何寻求治疗的培训，并对校园社区进行心理健康问题的教育。
q2.front: Forty-six universities are beefing up behavioral health care on campus in an effort to provide support services and limit the stigma of mental health treatment. The colleges and universities announced Tuesday that they have committed to improving students' access to mental health services.
q2.middle: Joining the effort are schools including Cornell University; the University of California, Berkeley; and Vanderbilt University.
q2.ending: In addition, Howard University says it will provide therapy to students and faculty. According to the coalition, all of the schools will make online counseling available 24/7, hire more campus mental health staff, provide training for students on how to seek treatment, and educate the campus community about mental health issues.

options.sentence: Joining the effort are schools including Cornell University; the University of California, Berkeley; and Vanderbilt University.
To gain admission to the nation's most prestigious colleges and universities, students today must meet increasingly rigid academic standards.
Colleges are debating whether they need to increase the availability of these services.
Colleges are facing new scrutiny over whether they are offering enough financial aid to students who need it most.

options.sentence: Dozens of universities and colleges are trying to reduce the stigma of mental health treatment by improving mental health care on their campus.
The new regulations mean that mental health will be an allowable essential health care item under most student health care plans.
The campaign will be led by Universities UK, the umbrella group for university presidents, vice-chancellors and university boards across the UK.
The University of California Academic Senate executive committee voted unanimously to approve a voluntary agreement that will provide comprehensive mental health care for students.
